overview:
Falko Timme is the founder of Timme Hosting, a company offering managed nginx webhosting in LÃ¼neburg, Germany (Hamburg area).

He is also the co-founder and one of the main developers of ISPConfig, with several thousand downloads each month one of the most popular, Linux-based OpenSource server control panels.

Since 2005, he is the maintainer and one of the main contributors to HowtoForge, a portal with thousands of Linux-related tutorials.

He has also contributed to the O’Reilly book “Linux System Administration”.

Falko has been working with Linux since the mid-90s and tries to give back his knowledge to the Linux community through his tutorials at HowtoForge and his programming work for ISPConfig. This knowledge also forms the backbone for his newest venture, Timme Hosting.
